Query.Sentence: SELECT n.text_notification, n.time_notification, t.origin_title, t.origin_address, t.destination_title, t.destination_address, t."date", t."time", c.car_registration, cb.brand_name, cm.model_name, co.color_name, tu."name" as driver FROM notification n JOIN trip t ON t.id_trip = n.id_trip JOIN car c ON c.id_car = t.id_car JOIN car_brand cb ON cb.id_car_brand = c.id_car_brand JOIN car_model cm ON cm.id_car_model = c.id_car_model JOIN color co ON co.id_color = c.id_color JOIN booking b ON b.id_trip = t.id_trip JOIN tuser tu ON tu.user_ = t.id_user #WHERE# ORDER BY n.time_notification DESC
